org.codehaus.mojo.servicedocgen.introspection

Class JavaDocHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codehaus.mojo.servicedocgen.introspection.JavaDocHelper

  • public class JavaDocHelper
extends Object
    Helper to parse JavaDoc tags and transform to regular HTML.
    Author:
    hohwille
    See Also:
    parseJavaDoc(JavaClass, GenericType, String)

      • parseJavaDoc

        public String parseJavaDoc(com.thoughtworks.qdox.model.JavaClass sourceType,
                  net.sf.mmm.util.reflect.api.GenericType<?> byteType,
                  String javadoc)
        Parses JavaDoc and resolves tags such as @link, @linkplain, @literal, @value, or @code.
        Parameters:
        sourceType - the JavaClass from source-code analysis.
        byteType - the GenericType from byte-code analysis.
        javadoc - the JavaDoc comment to parse.
        Returns:
        the given JavaDoc comment transformed to a pure HTML fragment.
